name: 3dTSgen
author: AFNI Team
description: This program generates an AFNI 3d+time data set based on user-specified signal and noise models for each voxel.

inputs.description: Filename of prototype 3d + time data file
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Set the TR of the created timeseries to be the TR of the prototype dataset. The default is TR = 1.
inputs.name: In-TR Flag

inputs.description: Constraints for kth signal parameter. Format: k c d where c <= gs[k] <= d
inputs.name: Signal constraints

inputs.description: Constraints for kth noise parameter. Format: k c d where c+b[k] <= gn[k] <= d+b[k]
inputs.name: Noise constraints

inputs.description: Standard deviation of additive Gaussian noise
inputs.name: Sigma value

inputs.description: Filename of output 3d + time data file
inputs.name: Output file

inputs.description: Write kth signal parameter gs[k]. Output 'fim' is written to prefix filename
inputs.name: Signal coefficient file

inputs.description: Write kth noise parameter gn[k]. Output 'fim' is written to prefix filename
inputs.name: Noise coefficient file

inputs.description: Create one AFNI 'bucket' dataset containing n sub-bricks. n=0 creates the default output. Output 'bucket' is written to prefixname
inputs.name: Bucket configuration

inputs.description: Specify content for sub-brick in the form 'm t k label' where m is the sub-brick number, t is 'scoef' or 'ncoef', k is parameter index, and label is a descriptive label.
inputs.name: Brick configuration
